name: Bepsi
about: Being the main proprietor of stalls for the incoming vendors to the festival grounds, Bepsi is a titan of the industry. Always keen to support local festivities with their reach of suppliers and vendors.

name: Snek Solutions
about: A new sponsor to the Irish arts fold, Snek Solutions are providing any and all security solutions required. Between monitoring staff, to facial recognition devices on the stage grounds.

name: Weyland-Yutani
about: When not competing with the big industry moguls globally, Weyland-Yutani invest in promoting varying cultures in the focus to create a wordlwide unity.

name: E-Corp
about: E-Corp are here to provide all the necessary technology for the musical festival which includes all IoT devices, audio equipment, and networking solutions.. what a great organisation!

name: Cyberdyne Systems
about: Well done, you've found an easter egg within the code!.. Now ignore the festival goers that do not require sustenance and enjoy your time here..'
